bibl.title: Telephus on Paros: Genealogy and Myth in the ""New Archilochus"" Poem (P Oxy. 4708).
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXIX, 4708 (= M.-P.3 122; LDAB 327). - Liminal Telephus: Mysian or Greek? - Arsacids and Heraclids: Telephus' heritage in Archilochus. - Telephus and the wrong war. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Laura A. Swift, Telephus on Paros: Genealogy and Myth in the ""New Archilochus"" Poem (P Oxy. 4708).
P. Oxy. LXIX, 4708 (= M.-P.3 122; LDAB 327). - Liminal Telephus: Mysian or Greek? - Arsacids and Heraclids: Telephus' heritage in Archilochus. - Telephus and the wrong war. - Conclusion.
